key.name: Several of the Lumarigon elders corrupted by the Demon King\nshifted the balance of power from light to dark by his will.\nThe creatures of darkness formed from this are known as "Kargon".
Tribal division between light and dark adherents dragged on, \nand now Drachenheim is facing its greatest threat ever.
To protect Mika, Layla used forbidden magic to cover her escape.\nAs a result, Layla lost all of her powers as the successor of light.
Mika, you must purge the lumenstone of chaos\nand find the source of the power that Layla sent you.
The lumarigons: intelligent, strong, and unfalteringly good. When the darkness came, they joined the fight for Maple World's soul.
But these great dragons were not invincible. After their leader, the dragon master Biset, fell in battle, the lumarigons all but died out.
To save themselves, the lumarigons escaped to the sanctum of their people and entered a deep slumber.
It is said that when a new dragon master rises, the lumarigons will return to Maple World.
Over the years, the lumarigons vanished from memory. That is, until the day of the siege of Tria...
The dragon Madria rode into battle–could it have been one of these fabled lumarigons? Have they turned to the darkness?
If the lumarigons have joined the enemy, then the light of Maple World may soon be extinguished…
Birth... Light...
Darkness... Death...
Fate...
What are you doing here? Got a death wish, punk?
Ugh... It's... It's you isn't it. All this, just to find a few\ndeadbeats? You're... You're mad, Gray Wolf...
You ain't leavin' here alive.
Not another step! The boss has words for you!
I heard someone was roughing up my men...\nBut it's just you... Gray Wolf...
Hahaha...\nWelcome to my domain.
The power to call a dragon…\nIf I can become the Kaiser, I will claim this world... Even if I must destroy it.
Destruction by light...
Time and again, new threats have risen against Maple World.
The forces of darkness set their eyes upon the empire.
Sky Fortress lifted off to face this evil.
And... Infernog was revived.
But in the face of such danger, Maple World's heroes refused to give up.
These heroes sought out new power to aid their cause.
The power of the light grew ever brighter.
The world was changing.
And that change... began to manifest within the world itself.
コードE適用完了。臨界点まで異常なし。\nシンクロ率98%到達！2つの個体ともにフェーズ3に突入します！
いいぞ。
大丈夫。僕たちは一緒だよ。\n絶対離れない。
食い止めろ！
記憶は破片に過ぎない。\nある記憶は鮮明だが、大事な記憶は\nいつも霧に包まれて何も見えない。
…まだ遅くない。
マスター！どうして素性の知れない…\nしかも人間に「あの力」を…！
ただ…純理に従うだけだ。
新しい人生は失われた記憶の上に…。
…刻まれて、埋められていく。
バランスを取らなければ崩れてしまうぞ。
おい、聞いているのか？
あいつ…！
ルニックタの主人よ…待っていたぞ。
ルニックタの主人の邪魔をするとは…いい度胸だな…！
闇の種が
お前の中に根を張れば…。
激しい苦痛が襲ってくるだろう。
そして…その果てで
魔王の…息子が誕生するだろう。
